meaning_str.bing:
n. 镜子；写照；反映某种情况的事物
v. 反映；反射；映照
网络. 镜像；镜射；镜报

镜子；写照；反映某种情况的事物

镜子；反射物；映像；真实反映；写照；反映某种情况的事物；（计算机）镜像网站；镜像文件；备份站点
反映；映射；反射；映照；与…十分相似

1.en: Casting a mirror image from her good eye, Barron created a prosthetic device that she can pop in whenever she goes out in public.
1.cn: Barron以她健康完好的右眼为模型，为她制作了假体，使她可以随时戴着出门。

2.en: No one know of my existence, the great artist the mirror to see their true: my name is clement Matthew, failed musician, failed.
2.cn: 没有人知道我的存在，伟大的艺术家镜子看到自己真正的：我的名字叫克莱门特马太，失败的音乐家，失败了。

3.en: my sister, suddenly laughed, it let me, in the mirror. oh, i put a piece of butter on the nose against it, like a joke!
3.cn: 姐姐突然笑了，这笑让我莫名其妙，一照镜子，呵，我把一块奶油蹭在了鼻子上，活像一个小丑！

0.en: Yes, the mirror. Absolutely love that mirror. Anyway, thank you.
0.cn: 对，镜子，我非常喜欢，谢谢你。

1.en: You didn't buy her a mirror. I know.
1.cn: 你根本没送镜子。我知道。

2.en: Oh, I thought there was a mirror there. Okay, bye-bye.
2.cn: 我还以为那里有镜子，好吧，再见。

3.en: It's like looking into an obnoxious little mirror, isn't it?
3.cn: 是不是感觉像看着一面另人讨厌的镜子？

4.en: Peppa is admiring herself in the mirror. Mirror, mirror on the wall, who is the fairest of them all? You are, Peppa.
4.cn: 佩琪在欣赏镜子里的自己。镜子镜子，回答我，世界上最漂亮的人是谁？当然是你啦，佩琪。

5.en: Peppa is admiring herself in the mirror. Mirror, mirror on the wall, who is the fairest of them all? You are, Peppa.
5.cn: 佩奇在欣赏镜子里的自己。镜子镜子，回答我，世界上最漂亮的人是谁？当然是你啦，佩奇。

6.en: Are the mirrors amazing, Daddy Pig? Wow, I can see two of you. What do you mean? I can see you in the mirror, but there is no mirror. Is it magic?
6.cn: 镜子是不是很神奇，爸爸？哇，我能看见两个你。你是什么意思？我可以看见镜子里的你，但是这里没有镜子，是魔法吗？

7.en: It's a mirror, George. Mirrors are shiny, that's why you can see yourself.
7.cn: 这是一面镜子，乔治。镜子很亮，这就是为什么你能看到自己的原因。

8.en: Are you sure you weren't looking at your hands in a mirror?

9.en: And Hermione, had the mirror. I bet you anything she was using it to look around corners in case it came along.
9.cn: 至于赫敏，是那面镜子。她一定是要用镜子探照角落预防蛇怪出现。

10.en: Do you ever look in the mirror and want to see someone else?
10.cn: 你有没有过照镜子时希望能看到其他人？

11.en: Oh, I will. But I will need a mirror, as he is me.
11.cn: 哦, 我会的。但我要先找一面镜子因为这个人就是我。

12.en: Oh, please. Look in the mirror. You both look ten years older than I do.
12.cn: 得了吧。拜托照照镜子，你俩看起来比我老十岁。

13.en: How is it I got the Stone, sir? One minute I was staring in the mirror and…
13.cn: 我怎么会得到魔法石的？先前，我还在照镜子。

14.en: That's so cool. They jiggle the same. It's like looking in a fat mirror.
14.cn: 太酷炫了，它们震动的频率还一致，好像在照镜子一样。

15.en: Well, is there any chance you were looking into a bright, shiny thing called a mirror?
15.cn: 你该不会是刚好看到一种叫做镜子的东西吧？

16.en: What did I do? Sheldon doesn't allow flossing that close to the mirror.
16.cn: 我，我做错什么了？谢尔顿禁止在离镜子这么近的地方用牙线。

17.en: And Mrs. Norris? I'm pretty sure she didn't have a camera or a mirror, Harry.
17.cn: 诺里斯太太呢？她肯定没有拿照相机或镜子什么的，哈利。

18.en: Yes? If you like looking at butts so much, why don't you just go look in a mirror?
18.cn: 怎样？ 如果你那么喜欢看屁股，你何不自己去照镜子呢？

19.en: This mirror looks normal to me. Daddy, where's your big tummy gone? What tummy?
19.cn: 我照这个镜子看起来挺正常的。爸爸，你的大肚子去哪了？什么肚子？
